books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: Trees get along very well without people, but people don't get along without trees!

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A story about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South during the 1930s.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society under the rule of Big Brother.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A story about teenage angst and alienation in post-World War II America.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel exploring the themes of love, reputation, and class.
